summary: The diff implements most of the Igloo-style immersive healthcare transformation requirements. Major features include: immersive landing page with hero section, scroll-based navigation, cinematic sections with parallax, patient dashboard with glass morphism and Help Desk panel, doctor dashboard with mission control aesthetic and patient cards, comprehensive design system with charcoal/midnight blue and electric blue accents, and extensive micro-interactions. However, some specific details are missing or cannot be fully verified due to content truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Background particle animation or gradient shift specifically referencing hero-particles.dim_1920x1080.png
missing_requirements.reason: LandingPage.tsx references '/assets/generated/hero-particles.dim_1920x1080.png' for background, but the actual animated particle system or gradient shift animation implementation is not visible in the truncated code

missing_requirements.requirement: Health status icon illustration with glass effect (health-status-icon.dim_256x256.png) for patient dashboard center card
missing_requirements.reason: No reference to health-status-icon.dim_256x256.png found in PatientHome.tsx or AIHelpDesk.tsx. The health status card uses icon components but not the specified generated image

missing_requirements.requirement: Mini line chart animations showing animated vital trends
missing_requirements.reason: PatientList.tsx includes LineChart from recharts but the truncated code does not show animation implementation details for the charts. Only static chart structure is visible

No evidence of performance optimization measures, requestAnimationFrame usage patterns, or CSS will-change properties to ensure 60fps animations. useAnimatedCounter uses requestAnimationFrame but broader optimization strategy is not documented
